text: The Centre Party ( , Kesk; ), officially the Centre Party of Finland, is an agrarian political party in Finland. It was founded in 1906. The party's ideology can be seen as centre on the political spectrum. It has been also seen as liberal, social liberal, liberal-conservative, and conservative- liberal. Its leader is Annika Saarikko since 2020. ==References== Category:1900s establishments in Finland Category:1906 establishments in Europe Category:Political parties in Europe Category:Organizations based in Finland
title: Centre Party (Finland)
